adHeader: Need Professional Mortgage Help? Call An Expert FHA/Conv/VA/HARP
adDetails: *** Professional Home Loan Experience Here!! *** We have been successfully making home loans for the last 10 years.  We specialize in personal service and making your loan experience a good one! We currently have the following         Foreign national financing for second/vacation homes.       HARP 2.0 financing.  175% loan to value refinance (for Fannie/Freddie borrowers.)       FHA Financing for first time homebuyers and for refinancing.       Jumbo loan amounts for with FHA financing (in most areas).       Conventional and portfolio financing, even for Jumbo loan amounts.       We have the programs and rates to make your loan happen.  We are professional and will give you a 'no-BS' answer on your loan.  See our FHA program highlights at http://fhaloan.janusmtg.com. Call us today to go over your personal loan scenario! Go online at: www.janusmortgage.net ask for: Dan NMLS ID: 340961 DRE License: 01078456
